name: Fixie Dash
description:
Fixie Dash is a thrilling racing mobile game, where you can explore the stunning world of Fixed Gear Bike. The game has 2 modes where you can play it the way you want.

Time Trial: This mode is a race can be done one at a time or simultaneous depends on the track. The winning depends on the player who has a fastest time

Track Stand:Staying balanced on your bike while not moving.

This game can be made by using 3d models using Unity 3D, Adobe Flash and Adobe Photoshop.
